nearbyLocation: ['Dr. Sahil Clinic', 'Pooja Clinic', 'Yadav Dental & Eye Care', 'Prakash Hospital', 'Shri Rade Clinic', 'Dental Hospital', 'Petrol pump Maitri motors', 'Petrol Pump', "McDonald's", "McDonald's", 'Rao Dhaba', 'Taikisha Engineering India PVT. LTD.']
description:
Address:  Manesar, Gurgaon The flagship project of group silverglades, the tarudhan valley golf resort is indias first gated golf community. With boundaries spanning across 65 green acres; The tarudhan valley has been carefully designed to include exotic golf homes dotted around a exceptionally designed 9-Hole golf course by ... graham cooke. The valley offers apartments, villas and balinese style wooden cottages for gracious living, as well as a well-Appointed clubhouse, resort hotel, conferencing facilities and golf driving range. At the tarudhan valley its the country life at its absolute best.

The 9-Hole course has been beautifully designed by graham cooke, a five time canadian amateur champion. Now a quebec based architect, cooke is known for his classic design philosophy mixed with a modern sensitivity for environmental concerns. Like a fine craftsman, he believes in attention to detail and a hands-On approach.
The course
The most impressive aspect of the course is the restraint employed in its design. Not an oversized monster, it is eminently playable. The course offers three distinct and imaginative styles woven through the nine holes. The first three holes are planned as links-Styled golf, with large rolling greens embracing the look of famous courses like st. Andrews and the royal troon. The following four holes are dedicated to some of the world's best parkland courses - The first of which replicates augusta national's famed par three twelfth. And finally, the course finishes with two exceptional mediterranean-Styled holes. The orchard trees, water, sandy areas, rocky outcrops and clusters of colorful shrubs capture the character of courses such as valderrama in spain and pebble beach in california. Overall, each round is full of anticipation and players never tire of playing this enjoyable and imaginative course. Like all gated golf communities abroad the golf course is exclusively for property owners.More >>

description:
Address:  Sector 60, Gurgaon Luxury independent boutique villa | for sale| adani samsara | golf course extension| gurgaon, sec-60 | Can you imagine living next to a beautiful lake with ducks and fishes, in gurgaon? Are you seeking a lavish residence in a scenic place, at a prime location in gurgaon. Yes, then this property ... is truly worth..!

Luxury independent boutique villa , a primium property inside a gated and secure, low rise/low density community at the end of golf course road at sector-60 gurgaon.

Uniquely positioned as facing a beautiful lake from both sides of the apartment. Lake with ducks, fishes, birds and fountains and surrounded by green. 

Details of the property : 
# the property is eloquently designed and is stretched across built up area of 7500++ sq. Ft. (6400 sq ft saleable area)

# 9 bhk++. 9 large size rooms with 3 living and dining area, semi furnished apartment built on 300 sq yard plot (300 sq empty space next door, common area)
===============

Furnishings and features: 

This villa floor is furnished with a number of features incorporated such as the basic facilities of lights and fans along with bathroom fixtures altogether.
Additional furnishings-

# spacious wardrobes 
# fans, lights and exhaust fan
# branded geysers
# brand new acs (Vrv)
# jaguar fittings in bathrooms
# modular kitchen
# chimney
# curtains rods 
# double beds queen size (Optional)
# flower pots with plants in each balcony and common areas. Absolutely green place all over.

The property has simple and elegant interiors set up for you and your family to have a scintillating experience. 

Other amenities::

# gated community 
# lift with power back
# electricity from 33 kva station by adani 
# 24x7 power back (Automatic switching within seconds) 
# 24x7 filtered water (Municipal corporation water) 
# pressure water
# 36 security guards 

Parking : 9 car parks on ground floor 

Vastu: 
Imagine waking up with the sun early in the morning. North-East facing. Airy & sunny. Crosswind. Direct sun in the balcony of 6 bedrooms and sun in the balcony of the other 6 rooms in second half. 

The property has been constructed according to the vaastu guidelines which helps in procuring positivity. 

========

Additional features :

# access to rooftop garden
# 11 feet height
# 3 side open
# lake, garden, basketball court facing
# corner unit
# triple plc apartment 
# green all around the community 
# 3 layer security.Security personnel 24 x 7 in the gated community with 36 guards 
# cameras all around for security 
# piped-Gas
# visitor lounge on ground floor
# 9 car parks on ground floor 
# visitor/ guest parking and good no of parking available inside or just outside the community 

# waste disposal
# open gym, basketball court, badminton court, skating ring in the community
# central green 
# kids playing area. 
# walking track along the lake, full circle. 
# water curtains at green area 
# lift in each villa, total 72 villas

# club house (By adani, 1 lac sq ft., coming up shortly)
# mall next door (By adani, coming up shortly) 
# clinic, school, mandir next door (By adani, coming up shortly) 

Location : 

This property is strategically located in an advantageous location in gurgaon as all amenities are available nearby.

# metro station 2.5 km away (Sector 56 metro station)
# cinema halls, world mark & many malls
# hospitals
# international standard schools 
# major sporting facilities
# golf courses , horse riding clubs
# big parks & nurseries 
# open and clean roads
# major pubs and night spots 
# 10-15 mins to cyber hub & huda city centre
# 3 mins to worldmark-3
# 15 mins to ambience mall and mg road
# 25-30 mins away from the ig international airport

Curent rent from villa : 5.0 l pmMore >>

Spread across 150 acres and being developed in well planned phases, this secured gated community of exclusive villas is located just 15 minutes from indira ga... ndhi international (Igi) airport. 
Envisaged with meticulous planning and executed with superior craftsmanship, phase 1 of international city comprising of 208 villas and built-Up area of approx. One million sq.Ft. Is fully complete with families already experiencing a privileged lifestyle. These villas of international city by sobha limited are truly international.
Phase 2 of international city spread over 41 acres comprising of presidential villas, duplex villas & row houses is in advanced stages of construction and is certain to redefine luxury living in delhi ncr.
International city villa life right at the edge of delhi
International city is a villa only community located in the vicinity of igi airport, new delhi. It is right next to the upcoming dwarka expressway and is the closest villa community to new delhi. Located in sector 109 & 106 gurgaon, international city is only a 20-25 minutes' drive from posh south delhi locales and business & entertainment hubs of gurgaon.
Carefully planned infrastructure in a landscaped environment
International city is an urban enclave of villas with an elegant private neighbourhood offering symmetry in design, picturesque pathways and rich finishes. The township also offers low density living with just six plots an acre and carefully planned infrastructure with broad roads, full power back-Up through dedicated service yards, fibre optic cable network and a 5 million litre massive water tank along-With water treatment plant.
The project is set within an inspiring environment of manicured landscapes that will make you breathe clean air and offer green living in true sense. Over 3,100 trees have been planted in phase 1 including flowering plants & fruit trees in each villa. Designed by international consultants, international city has large landscaped open spaces, tree-Lined avenues and green spaces on either side of the roads. The township has been planned with eco-Friendly infrastructure like rain water harvesting, sewage & water treatment plants and organic waste converters.More >>

description:
Address: North, Sector 109, Gurgaon International city is one of the most luxurious villa communities of delhi ncr, executed to international standards of design & construction. Spread across 150 acres and being developed in well planned phases, this secured gated community of exclusive villas is located just 15 minutes from indira ga... ndhi international (Igi) airport. 
Envisaged with meticulous planning and executed with superior craftsmanship, phase 1 of international city comprising of 208 villas and built-Up area of approx. One million sq.Ft. Is fully complete with families already experiencing a privileged lifestyle. These villas of international city by sobha limited are truly international.
Phase 2 of international city spread over 41 acres comprising of presidential villas, duplex villas & row houses is in advanced stages of construction and is certain to redefine luxury living in delhi ncr.
International city villa life right at the edge of delhi
International city is a villa only community located in the vicinity of igi airport, new delhi. It is right next to the upcoming dwarka expressway and is the closest villa community to new delhi. Located in sector 109 & 106 gurgaon, international city is only a 20-25 minutes' drive from posh south delhi locales and business & entertainment hubs of gurgaon.
Carefully planned infrastructure in a landscaped environment
International city is an urban enclave of villas with an elegant private neighbourhood offering symmetry in design, picturesque pathways and rich finishes. The township also offers low density living with just six plots an acre and carefully planned infrastructure with broad roads, full power back-Up through dedicated service yards, fibre optic cable network and a 5 million litre massive water tank along-With water treatment plant.
The project is set within an inspiring environment of manicured landscapes that will make you breathe clean air and offer green living in true sense. Over 3,100 trees have been planted in phase 1 including flowering plants & fruit trees in each villa. Designed by international consultants, international city has large landscaped open spaces, tree-Lined avenues and green spaces on either side of the roads. The township has been planned with eco-Friendly infrastructure like rain water harvesting, sewage & water treatment plants and organic waste converters.More >>

description:
Address: B22, Sector 70A, Gurgaon Bptp visionary villas is a residential project located in sector 70a, gurgaon, developed by bptp limited. It offers a premium living experience with a focus on luxury, comfort, and modern amenities. Here are some key details about the project:### 1. **location:**
 - Situated in sector 70a, gurgaon... , bptp visionary villas is well-Connected to major roads and highways like sohna road and nh-8, providing easy access to other parts of the city.
 - It is in close proximity to shopping malls, schools, hospitals, and office complexes, making it an ideal location for both families and working professionals.

### 2. **project type:**
 - The project consists of spacious independent villas, offering a high-End lifestyle with privacy and ample space for families.
 - The villas are designed with modern architecture and high-Quality finishes, offering both style and functionality.

### 3. **size and configuration:**
 - The villas are available in different configurations and sizes to cater to varying needs.
 - Typical villa sizes range from 3500 to 5000 square feet, providing ample living space, including multiple bedrooms, bathrooms, and balconies.
 
### 4. **amenities:**
 - **clubhouse**: The project features a state-Of-The-Art clubhouse with recreational facilities such as a gym, swimming pool, and indoor games.
 - **landscape gardens**: The development includes beautifully landscaped gardens and green spaces for residents to enjoy.
 - **24x7 security**: Gated security with cctv surveillance ensures the safety of residents.
 - **sports facilities**: Facilities for outdoor sports like tennis courts, basketball courts, and a jogging track.
 - **power backup**: Full power backup for uninterrupted services.

### 5. **design and interiors:**
 - Bptp visionary villas are designed with contemporary and luxurious interiors. High ceilings, expansive windows, and elegant flooring are some of the key features.
 - The villas also feature modern kitchen layouts and well-Appointed bathrooms, contributing to a high standard of living.

### 6. **price range:**
 - Prices vary based on the size and configuration of the villas, but they generally fall in the premium segment, making it an ideal choice for buyers looking for a luxury lifestyle.

### 7. **nearby areas:**
 - The project is close to the commercial and retail hubs of gurgaon, such as golf course extension road, sector 50, and sohna road, ensuring easy access to all necessities.
 - Well-Known schools, hospitals, and shopping malls like ambience mall and mg road are also within a short drive.

### 8. **investment potential:**
 - Given the strategic location, high-Quality construction, and luxury offerings, bptp visionary villas holds a good investment potential, with expected appreciation in value over time.

If you're considering moving to gurgaon or looking for a luxury villa, bptp visionary villas could be a great option to explore!More >>

description: Address:  Nirvana Country, Gurgaon Unitech escape is a nice society to live in gurgaon. The society is equipped with a gym, swimming pool, badminton court, tennis court, table tennis room, basket ball court and has occupied the park outside which serves as cricket and football game ground. Green area is amazing, there's lot of well m... aintained greenery. The construction quality is poor, rain water get filled in the basement during rainy season. There's green belt right outside the apartments with a service lane connecting to the society. The green belt is also maintained by the apartment administration. Rwa is not great, they do not solve issues but only work towards beautification. Security is good, the apartments use mygate for security. It's easy to get help of all kinds and because it is located on the golf course extension road it's quite well connected.More >>

description:
Address:  Sector 109, Gurgaon International city is one of the most luxurious villa communities of delhi ncr, executed to international standards of design & construction. Spread across 150 acres and being developed in well planned phases, this secured gated community of exclusive villas is located just 15 minutes from indira ga... ndhi international (Igi) airport. 
Envisaged with meticulous planning and executed with superior craftsmanship, phase 1 of international city comprising of 208 villas and built-Up area of approx. One million sq.Ft. Is fully complete with families already experiencing a privileged lifestyle. These villas of international city by sobha limited are truly international.
Phase 2 of international city spread over 41 acres comprising of presidential villas, duplex villas & row houses is in advanced stages of construction and is certain to redefine luxury living in delhi ncr.
International city villa life right at the edge of delhi
International city is a villa only community located in the vicinity of igi airport, new delhi. It is right next to the upcoming dwarka expressway and is the closest villa community to new delhi. Located in sector 109 & 106 gurgaon, international city is only a 20-25 minutes' drive from posh south delhi locales and business & entertainment hubs of gurgaon.
Carefully planned infrastructure in a landscaped environment
International city is an urban enclave of villas with an elegant private neighbourhood offering symmetry in design, picturesque pathways and rich finishes. The township also offers low density living with just six plots an acre and carefully planned infrastructure with broad roads, full power back-Up through dedicated service yards, fibre optic cable network and a 5 million litre massive water tank along-With water treatment plant.
The project is set within an inspiring environment of manicured landscapes that will make you breathe clean air and offer green living in true sense. Over 3,100 trees have been planted in phase 1 including flowering plants & fruit trees in each villa. Designed by international consultants, international city has large landscaped open spaces, tree-Lined avenues and green spaces on either side of the roads. The township has been planned with eco-Friendly infrastructure like rain water harvesting, sewage & water treatment plants and organic waste converters.More >>

Property details:

Type: Independent 4 bhk villa
Plot size: 360 square yards
Built-Up area: Approximately 4,200 to 5,600 square feet
Bedrooms: 4 spacious bedrooms
Bathrooms: 5 well-Appointed bathrooms
Balconies: More than 3 balconies
Parking: 2 covered & 1 open parking spaces
Key features:

Modern architecture: 
Contemporary design with premium finishes, ensuring a blend of aesthetics and functionality.

Spacious interiors: 
Generous room sizes with ample natural light and ventilation.

Private garden: 
A serene backyard garden, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.

Additional space suitable for a home theater, gym, or storage.

Two-Side open:
 Enhanced privacy and cross-Ventilation.

Community amenities:

State-Of-The-Art facilities including a gymnasium, swimming pool, and recreational areas.

 Tennis court, squash court, basketball court, and badminton court.
Children's play area: 
Safe and engaging spaces for children.
Landscaped gardens:
 Lush green spaces for leisure and community events.
24/7 security: 
Round-The-Clock surveillance and security personnel.
Power backup: 
Uninterrupted power supply for residents.
Location advantages:

Strategic location: 
Located on sohna road, offering seamless connectivity to major parts of gurugram and delhi.

Proximity to amenities:
 Close to educational institutions, healthcare facilities, shopping malls, and entertainment centers.

Transport connectivity: 
Easy access to nh 8 and igi airport, enhancing travel convenience.

Pricing:
The villa is competitively priced at 10.75 crore, reflecting its premium features and prime location. 

Don't miss the opportunity to own a piece of luxury in one of gurugram's most sought-After communities.More >>

description:
Address:  Sector 109, Gurgaon About sobha international city
Sobha international city is an exclusive villa township located on dwarka expressway in sector 109, gurgaon. The project is spread across 150-Acres, a gated villa community with lush landscape and tree-Lined avenues. Sobha international city villas is a world-Class tow... nship in planning, design, craftsmanship, and architectural quality. As well as a private garden and terrace, each villa offers ample space for residents to relax and enjoy the outdoors. A strategically planned development, the international city has been designed and being executed in four premeditated phases. Sobha international city phase 1 is located in sector 109 gurgaon just off the dwarka expressway.


Sobha international city phase 2 is ready to move and spread across 43 acres of land. It is a consummate destination to buy luxurious villas and row houses in gurgaon.


Phase 3 and 4 of the international city gurgaon are planned for future development, which will cover over 71 acres in sector 106, gurgaon.


Sobha international city highlights
An exclusive villa township
Low density living
Well-Planned infrastructure
206 villas phase 1 & 135 villas in phase 2
Eco-Friendly approach including rainwater harvesting
Lush green avenues with trees & shrubs on both sides of the roads
Clubhouse spread over 65,000 sq.Ft.
5 levels with a roof-Top swimming pool
Gated villa community with tree lined avenues



International city features
Villa township
A secured & low density villa community with just 6 plots per acre*. It offers presidential villas, duplex villas & luxury row houses.


Development
International city is divided into 4 phases. Phase 1 is spread across 36 acres in sector 109, phase 2 is over 43 acres in sector 109, gurgaon.


Immaculate design
Landscaped open spaces with lush eco-System, tree-Lined avenues & green spaces on both side of roads.


Premier club life
The international city club is spread across a lavish 2 acres and offers exclusive sports and recreational experiences.More >>

description:
Address:  Sector 33, Gurgaon Just minutes away from the national highway - 8, near rajiv chowk, yet miles away from madness, uniworld resorts is nestled in the heart of bustling development of gurgaon at sector - 33 & 48, off the sohna road
In addition to an excellent connectivity via road, uniworld resorts is minutes away from...  the proposed metro route
Also, within 15 min driving distance are world class schools such as shikshantar, the shri ram school, dps, heritage, amity international, pathways, gd goenka; And hospitals such as medcity, artemis, max, fortis, apollo, sir gangaram & batra.

Specifications of unitech the villas
Structure
 Earthquake resistant rcc framed structure
Wall finish
 External : Texture paint finish stone accent; Wooden trellis; Slate/managlore roof tiles for sloping roofs
 Internal : Choice of acrylic emulsion on pop base, ceilings in oil bound distemper
Staircase
 Tread & riser : Imported marble / granite
Flooring
 Living / dining / lounge on ground floor : Italian marble / hardwood flooring
 Family room / lounge on other floors : Imported marble
 Bedrooms : Hardwood flooring
 Lift lobbies : Imported marble
 Kitchen : Premium ceramic / porcelain tiles
 Balconies & terraces : Anti-Skid tiles
Kitchen
 Wall finishes : Premium ceramic / porcelain wall tiles upto 2' height above work counter
 Accessories : Working platform surface in granite with recessed double bowl sink and drainer
Toilets
 Walls : Premium ceramic / porcelain wall tiles full height upto ceiling
 Flooring : Premium ceramic / porcelain tiles
 Fittings : Imported white sanitary fixtures and imported bath fittings.
 Five fixtures bathroom for master bedroom.
 Other bedrooms with 3/4 fixtures bathroom
Doors
 Main entry : Seasoned teak wood frame; Teak paneled shutter with melamine polish
 Internal : Seasoned teak wood frame; European style moulded shutters / teak veneered flush doors with melamine finish
 Ironmongery : Brush stainless steel handles and latches
Windows / glazing
 Powder coated/anodized aluminium frame with toughened glass
Electrical
 All copper electrical wiring in concealed conduit; Provision for adequate light and power points; Telephone and tv outlets in all bedrooms and the living room; Premium quality moulded modular plastic switches with protective mcbs
Power back-Up
 100% power back-Up
Air-Conditioning
 Provision for split air-Conditioning. Optional upgrade to vrv technology air conditioning with heating and cooling
Home automation
 Mood lighting - Switching and dimming lights - By finger touch backlit panel mounted on wall or sleek remote control. Automation of curtains/blinds and fans (On/off). Motion sensors in dress, bath and staircase. Special motion sensors in front parking area. Master control panel at entrance lounge.
ElevatMore >>

Address:  Sector 53, Gurgaon Parsvnath exotica in sector 53, gurgaon is a ready-To-Move housing society. It offers apartments in varied budget range. These units are a perfect combination of comfort and style, specifically designed to suit your requirements and conveniences. There are 3bhk, 4bhk, 5bhk and 6bhk apartments availa... ble in this project. This housing society is now ready to be called home as families have started moving in. Check out some of the features of parsvnath exotica housing society:

*parsvnath exotica sector 53 has 18 towers, with 18 floors each and 786 units on offer.

*spread over an area of 27 acres, parsvnath exotica sector 53, gurgaon is one of the spacious housing societies in the gurgaon region. With all the basic amenities available, parsvnath exotica fits into your budget and your lifestyle.

*sector 53, gurgaon has good connectivity to some of the important areas in the proximity such as sector 53-54 metro station, golf course road and shiv nadar school and so on.

Parsvnath exotica price list

If you are looking for ready to move projects, parsvnath exotica is a right choice for you. Here, a 3bhk apartment is available at a starting price of rs. 3.15 cr while a 4bhk apartment is offered at rs. 7.73 cr onwards. For a 5bhk apartment at parsvnath exotica, you will need to spend at least rs. 10.64 cr those who are looking for investment opportunities in parsvnath exotica may find it worthy from a long-Term perspective to earn rental income. 

Configuration size price
3bhk apartment 1,380 sq.Ft. Rs. 3.15 cr

An impeccable opportunity is here for those who are looking to own aesthetically designed independent villa in ggurgaon which ensures a relaxed and c... omfortable stay. Being an independent villa, it provides you a serene and tranquil environment with a modern setup. This villa provides ample natural light and has good ventilation that invites comfort.
Basic details:
You will love this villa which is constructed on a built-Up area of 2700 sq.Ft. And features 9 bedrooms, 9 bathroom and 4 balcony and a modular kitchen. The villa is beautifully landscaped with garden.
An impeccable opportunity awaits those seeking to own an aesthetically designed independent house in the heart of gurgaon. Located in a block, sushant lok phase 1, haryana, this stunning property boasts a modern setup and offers the perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality.
Basic details:
- Built-Up area: 2700 sq. Ft. Per floor (300 sq. Yard)
- 9 spacious bedrooms with ample storage space
- 9 bathrooms with modern fixtures and sleek designs
- 4 balconies offering stunning views of the surrounding area
- Modular kitchens on each floor, equipped with high-End appliances and fixtures
- Beautifully landscaped garden, perfect for outdoor relaxation and entertainment
- Basement with mezzanine floor, featuring a height of approximately 40 feet - Parking for 6 cars (2 inside, 3 outside), providing ample space for vehicles
Key features:
- Abundant natural light and good ventilation on both sides, ensuring a comfortable living experience
- Modern and sleek design, perfect for those who value style and sophistication
- Spacious bedrooms and bathrooms, providing ample space for relaxation and entertainment
- Modular kitchens on each floor, equipped with modern appliances and fixtures
- Beautifully landscaped garden, perfect for outdoor relaxation and entertainment
Location:
- Strategically located on the service road, with the famous galleria market, dlf phase 4, and dlf club just a stone's throw away
- Metro station just 5 minutes away, providing easy access to the rest of the city
- Mg road, with its array of big brands and malls, is just a 5-Minute drive away
- Golf course road, one of gurgaon's poshest areas, is just a short drive away.More >>
